RawLine: GUIDE.01.002,首先對木人使出<color=#FF3333>蓄流</color>吧。<color=#FF3333> (按下按鈕，或是招式1快捷鍵)</color>,首先对木人使出<color=#FF3333>蓄流</color>吧。<color=#FF3333> (按下按钮，或是招式1快捷键)</color>

Items.r: 首先對木人使出<color=#FF3333>蓄流</color>吧。<color=#FF3333> (按下按鈕，或是招式1快捷鍵)</color>

Items.mt: First of all, let's use the flow on the wooden man. (Press the button, or the move 1 shortcut)
